mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(categoryKey, name, img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, content, price, sale, cnt) VALUES(${categoryKey}, #{name}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5}, #{content}, ${price}, ${sale}, ${cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item WHERE deleted='N' ORDER BY itemKey DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET deleted = 'Y' WHERE itemKey=${itemKey}
